C

canEnrage() - Method in class game.MyMonster
 
canEnrage() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Monster
This method returns true if monster hitPoints falls below this.enrageThreshold.
Creature - Interface in gameinterfaces
A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes: name: String description: String hitPoints: int damage: int room: Room The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Creature(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage) room should be initialized to null provide getters for the following attributes: name, description, hitPoints, damage, Room.

E

enrage() - Method in class game.MyMonster
 
enrage() - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Monster
This method will double this.damage for this Monster if it hasn't already been enraged.
enter(Player) - Method in class game.MyRoom
 
enter(Player) - Method in class game.MyTreasureRoom
 
enter(Player) - Method in interface gameinterfaces.Room
This method will display the message:

"player name" "This Room is this.description, and has this.monster"

If the monster isAlive() allow the player to enter the room and start a battle
enter(Player) - Method in interface gameinterfaces.TreasureRoom
This method will display the message:

"This Room is this.description, and has this.monster"

If the monster isAlive() allow the player to enter the room and start a battle If player is alive, display the message:

"You explored the room and found the hidden treasure!"
